entry.title: Clouds and Lines
entry.summary: A photograph of transmission towers running over a serpentine barren.

img.alt: A photograph of transmission towers running over a serpentine barren.

content.p: NIKON DF | TAMRON 80-210MM F3.8 | FX | 100 ISO | F8 | 1/250 | 2:3

entry.title: Path
entry.summary: A photograph of a trail in the woods leading to an open field. Afternoon light shines in spots between the trees.

img.alt: A photograph of a trail in the woods leading to an open field. Afternoon light shines in spots between the trees.

content.p: NIKON DF | NIKKOR-S 50MM F1.4 | FX | 100 ISO | F5.6 | 1/200 | 2:3

entry.title: Rust and Chrome
entry.summary: A photograph of a very old car wreck in the woods. The metal is deeply rusted, but the chrome shines brightly.

img.alt: A photograph of a very old car wreck in the woods. The metal is deeply rusted, but the chrome shines brightly.

content.p: NIKON DF | NIKKOR-NC 28MM F2 | FX | 100 ISO | F5.6 | 1/125 | 3:2

img.alt: A photograph of a purple leaf resting on a plant.

content.p: NIKON DF | NIKKOR-NC 28MM F2 | FX | 100 ISO | F2 | 1/250 | 2:3

entry.title: SORRY PUMP OUT OF ORDER
entry.summary: A nighttime photograph of out of order gas pumps sitting in an overgrown parking lot.

img.alt: A nighttime photograph of out of order gas pumps sitting in an overgrown parking lot.

entry.title: Hot Licks
entry.summary: A photograph of a sign that reads 'Hot Licks Guitar Shop' with an image of a faded guitar. Underneath is a sign that reads 'FOR LEASE'. In the background is the Waldorf Volunteer Fire Department.

img.alt: A photograph of a sign that reads 'Hot Licks Guitar Shop' with an image of a faded guitar. Underneath is a sign that reads 'FOR LEASE'. In the background is the Waldorf Volunteer Fire Department.

content.p: NIKON DF | NIKKOR-NC 28MM F2 | FX | 100 ISO | F8 | 1/500 | 2:3
